overview:
Internet entrepreneur, international speaker and author. +10 years of experience in marketing and digital advertising agencies, Co-Founder of Ebuzzing www.ebuzzing.com

#1 Pioneer in the art of Video Seeding and Buzz Marketing. #2 Co-author of the first Italian book about Buzz “Buzz Marketing nei Social Media”, Lupetti Editore 2009 #3 Co-founder of WOMMI (Word Of Mouth Marketing Italy)

Founder of PromoDigital www.promodigital.it 1st Italian Buzz Company successfully sold to Wikio Group in 2010;

MBA Professor of E-Business and E-commerce at European School Of Economics (English) // Speaker at Major Digital Advertising events: IAB Forum Milan, iStrategy London, iStrategy Amsterdam, Cannes Lions Advertising Festival, Dmexco Cologne.

Lecturer in Digital Marketing at major Business Schools: SDA Bocconi, Luiss Business School, IlSole24Ore, IULM, IED, Master Ca’ Foscari Venezia, Università Roma Tre, Università di Torino, Università di Urbino, Ateneo Impresa;
